events.name: Oklahoma City Thunder at Charlotte Hornets
Milwaukee Bucks at Los Angeles Lakers

headlines.description: Giannis Antetokounmpo scored 16 points, Damian Lillard had 14 in his Milwaukee debut, and the Bucks beat the Los Angeles Lakers 108-97 on Sunday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Lillard scores 14 points in Milwaukee debut as Bucks beat Lakers

events.name: Golden State Warriors at Sacramento Kings
